TopicTitle: Is there a addon that allows refueling on the surface of a planet?

Articles.Content:
First off, I've searched for quite a bit trying to find something like this and I haven't turned up with anything, sorry if there is something and I missed it.

I wanted to know if there was some kind of part mod that adds a fuel line you can hook up to ships in game on the surface of planets. So I can just land a fuel ship and fuel up all my vehicles instead of having to go through the hassle of maintaining a space station and having to run my ships back and forth from the surface whenever its needed, or whatever other reason there may be. Or maybe something that adds a way to create fuel/mine fuel on the surface of a planet and then use the same concept to fuel nearby ships.

Thanks for any help in advance.
Kerbal Attachment System lets you dock two vessels with a cable, so you can then transfer fuel between two parts on the docked vessels.
There's a refuelling mod on Spaceport (thread was destroyed in the forum crash). Allows auto-refuelling on the launchpad and runway.
Several of them, actually. Some require an EVA'ed kerbal to initiate the hookup, some don't.
